segments.text: Good morning . How can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to open a new account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you filled out an application form ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . And I've brought some documents along with me , too . Do you need to see my passport ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I'll just have my assistant look over these quickly and then we'll move on to the next step . Did you want to open up a checking account and a savings account ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Does the checking account come with a debit card ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Actually , both accounts come with cards that you can use in ATM machines , so that you won't have to come in to the bank to make a transaction .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is . Our customers really like it . Do you have any other questions about your new accounts ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . What's the maximum amount that you are allowed to have in an overdraft ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there a penalty for having an overdraft ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but it's not much . You just have to pay 1 % interest on the account . It's much lower rate than any of our loans and it's much better than owing money to most credit cards .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's true . Is everything alright with my documents ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They're all in order . If you just sign your name here , you'll receive your cards and pin numbers in the mail in about three weeks .
segments.speaker: S1
